name.title: Name
name.description: Name of the Evaluation to help identify it. Must be unique within the associated File.

orchestrated.title: Humanloop Orchestrated
orchestrated.description: Whether the Evaluator is orchestrated by Humanloop. Default is `True`. If `False`, a log for the Evaluator should be submitted by the user via the API.

anyOf.title: EvaluatorVersionId
anyOf.description: Base model for specifying an Evaluator for an Evaluation.

environment.title: Environment name
environment.description: If provided, the Version deployed to this Environment is used. If not provided, the Version deployed to the default Environment is used.

orchestrated.title: Humanloop Orchestrated
orchestrated.description: Whether the Evaluator is orchestrated by Humanloop. Default is `True`. If `False`, a log for the Evaluator should be submitted by the user via the API.

anyOf.title: EvaluatorFileId
anyOf.description: Base model for specifying an Evaluator for an Evaluation.

environment.title: Environment name
environment.description: If provided, the Version deployed to this Environment is used. If not provided, the Version deployed to the default Environment is used.

path.title: File path
path.description: Path identifying a File. Provide this to specify a File.

orchestrated.title: Humanloop Orchestrated
orchestrated.description: Whether the Evaluator is orchestrated by Humanloop. Default is `True`. If `False`, a log for the Evaluator should be submitted by the user via the API.

anyOf.title: EvaluatorFilePath
anyOf.description: Base model for specifying an Evaluator for an Evaluation.
